OOC: You're forgiven!

AzureBlade was glad. He set his feelings apart for now. They would 
have to get to the base first, and then, maybe, think of the future. A 
beep in his HUD indicated the city's proximity.

AzureBlade: I detect the base. We should see it... now! Do you see 
those golden towers?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> <<> The dragon smiled.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: I wanted to be honest. Forgive me if I scared you. For 
> > now, I think we should put a hold on this, at least until we have 
> > found out who you are. What do you think?>>
> 
> "That sounds fine." Mistra threw a smile to him in return "And you 
didn't 
> scare me...at least, not after you swore by your spark that you 
wouldn't hurt 
> me, regardless of who I  turned out to be." 
> 
> OOC: ^^;; Sorry for the delay...family troubles.
